feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2025-04-08: Release of version 9.3.1 is available
entry.content: The version 9.3.1 is available. Some bugs fixed and coding maps improved. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8
entry.summary: The version 9.3.1 is available. Some bugs fixed and coding maps improved. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8

entry.title: 2025-04-08: Release of version 9.3.2 is available
entry.content: The version 9.3.2 is available. Bug #851 fixed
entry.summary: The version 9.3.2 is available. Bug #851 fixed

entry.title: 2025-05-08: Release of version 9.3.4 is available

entry.summary: The version 9.3.4 is available. Some bugs fixed

entry.title: 2025-05-12: Release of version 9.3.5 is available
entry.content: The version 9.3.5 is available. Some improvements and some bugs fixed
